about_the_game:
The supreme "WARRIORS OROCHI" experience is here!
WARRIORS OROCHI 4: The Ultimate Upgrade Pack, full of premium replayable elements, is now available for the definitive installment of the "WARRIORS OROCHI" series WARRIORS OROCHI 4.

■ About WARRIORS OROCHI 4: The Ultimate Upgrade Pack
- The world of WARRIORS OROCHI 4 is expanded with the addition of new characters Gaia and Hades, who are here to shed some light on the questions left unanswered in the main story.
- Familiar faces from Koei Tecmo games: Achilles, Joan of Arc and Ryu Hayabusa join the battle!
- Enhanced Musou action, featuring the addition of the new Sacred Treasure exchange, and Musou Switch Combo systems!
- New replayability elements: Infinity and Challenge modes!

Please see the official website for details.

Note:
This content is an upgrade pack for WARRIORS OROCHI 4. Please beware that it will not operate if you do not own the main game WARRIORS OROCHI 4.
detailed_description:
Edition Comparison


Deluxe Edition

Content included in the Deluxe Edition:
- WARRIORS OROCHI 4: The Ultimate Upgrade Pack
- Legendary Costumes Orochi Pack 4
- Special Costumes "Hades" & "Yang Jian"
- Legendary Weapons Orochi Pack 4
- Sacred Treasures "Garm" & "World Tree Bident"
- Series BGM Pack

Deluxe Edition Bonuses:
- Bonus Weapons: War God's Halberd Z, God Smiter's Pike Z, Abaddon Z
- Early character unlock: Kyūbi, Tamamo, Yinglong
- 300,000 Growth Points, 3,000 Arena Points
- 100 Crystals

Note:
The items listed below can also be purchased separately. Please beware of purchasing the same content twice.
- Legendary Costumes Orochi Pack 4
- Special Costumes "Hades" & "Yang Jian"
- Legendary Weapons Orochi Pack 4
- Sacred Treasure "Garm" & "World Tree Bident"
- Series BGM Pack


About the Game

The supreme "WARRIORS OROCHI" experience is here!

- The world of WARRIORS OROCHI 4 is expanded with the addition of new characters Gaia and Hades, who are here to shed some light on the questions left unanswered in the main story.
- Familiar faces from Koei Tecmo games: Achilles, Joan of Arc and Ryu Hayabusa join the battle!
- Enhanced Musou action, featuring the addition of the new Sacred Treasure exchange, and Musou Switch Combo systems!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 8.1/10(64bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
  • Additional Notes: 640×480 pixel over, High Color
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 8.1/10(64bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080 pixel, True Color
